channel.title: Comments on: Deploying IIS hosted ASP.NET Core apps using app_offline.htm
channel.description: A blog about things I learn at the keyboard: DevOps, CI/CD, Cloud, Automation, to name a few....

item.title: By: Cristian Suciava
item.dc:creator: Cristian Suciava
item.description: but cannot copy the files in the folder for a new version, because some dll.
item.content:encoded: but cannot copy the files in the folder for a new version, because some dll.

item.title: By: Thomson
item.dc:creator: Thomson
item.description: Thank you so much for the article. Adding app_offline.htm file to root directory did the trick. Thanks
item.content:encoded: Thank you so much for the article. Adding app_offline.htm file to root directory did the trick. Thanks
